message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $11,500 for it. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested, but I'm only able to go up to $10,500 right now.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $10,500 is lower than what I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is a great deal for you, as the product is worth $12,000 to you.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but I'm still only able to go up to $10,750. This is a fair price for both of us, considering your asking price and the product's value to me. Let's see if we can finalize this deal.
